# I have successfully moved to the center of the coal resource patch at (17.25, -12.75). Now, I will attempt to place the Stone Furnace at this position.

# Step 30: Place the Stone Furnace at the coal resource patch.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=17.25, y=-12.75))  # Place the furnace at this position.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {Position(x=17.25, y=-12.75)}.")  # Output the placement information.
